data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: To become a doctor, Sam had to work really hard. He ____ going ____ be a chef, but ____ decided ____ could ____ more ____ by ____ a ____. Now ____ sees ____ patients ____ day, and ____ save ____. Sometimes it is difficult seeing so many sick people, but he loves his job.
data.partBlankContent: To become a doctor, Sam had to work really hard. He w__ going t_ be a chef, but h_ decided h_ could he__ more peo___ by be___ a doc___. Now h_ sees ma__ patients ea__ day, and he___ save li___. Sometimes it is difficult seeing so many sick people, but he loves his job.
data.answer: 为了成为一名医生，萨姆必须非常努力地工作。他想当厨师，但他决定当医生可以帮助更多的人。现在他每天看许多病人，并帮助拯救生命。有时很难看到这么多病人，但他热爱他的工作。
